item.title: 特朗普削减 DEI 迫使达沃斯精英为多样性寻找新词汇
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）总统对私营部门施加的放弃多元化计划的压力不断升级，这让达沃斯的一些人开始寻找新的词汇来描述他们认为对企业至关重要的工作场所实践。【原文：President Donald Trump's escalating pressure on the private sector to ditch diversity programs has left some in Davos searching for new words to describe workplace practices they say are essential to their businesses.】

item.title: 投资者在 Venture Global 首次公开募股降价前对其盈利前景表示担忧
item.description: 投资者告诉路透社，Venture Global LNG 被迫将其在美国首次公开募股（IPO）中寻求的估值降低近一半，因为投资者对该公司液化天然气用于出口的长期利润估算持反对意见。【原文：Venture Global LNG was forced to nearly halve the valuation it is seeking in its U.S. initial public offering (IPO) after investors balked at the company's estimated long-term profit for liquefying gas for export, investors told Reuters.】

item.title: 三星发布配备高通芯片和增强型人工智能功能的 Galaxy S25 手机
item.description: 三星电子（Samsung Electronics）周三发布了搭载高通（Qualcomm）芯片和谷歌人工智能模型的最新旗舰智能手机，希望其升级后的人工智能功能能重振销量，抵御苹果和中国竞争对手的冲击。【原文：Samsung Electronics on Wednesday unveiled its newest flagship smartphone, powered by Qualcomm's chips and Google's artificial-intelligence model, hoping its upgraded AI features can reinvigorate sales and fend off Apple and Chinese rivals.】

item.title: 安永调查显示，特朗普执政后，首席执行官们对交易前景更加乐观
item.description: 一项调查显示，在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）于11月当选连任后，越来越多的全球首席执行官预计将在2025年进行更多的企业交易。【原文：Global chief executives see much more corporate dealmaking in 2025, with an increased number expecting to pursue mergers and acquisitions after U.S. President Donald Trump was elected to a second term in November, a survey showed.】

item.title: 德国商业银行称裕信银行的做法是敌对的、单方面的
item.description: 德国商业银行周三将意大利联合信贷银行（UniCredit）的潜在合作方式定义为 "敌意"，并称在过去两年中没有与这家意大利银行进行过任何讨论，尽管意大利联合信贷银行首席执行官 Andrea Orcel 曾表示有过讨论。【原文：Commerzbank on Wednesday defined UniCredit's approach for a potential tie-up as "hostile", and said there had been no discussion of it with the Italian bank in the past two years, despite UniCredit CEO Andrea Orcel saying there had.】

item.title: 特朗普推动用关税支付减税在国会面临反对意见
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普正在推动一项计划，明确利用提高进口商品关税的收入来帮助支付延长数万亿美元减税政策的费用，这一史无前例的转变可能会遭到国会中许多共和党同僚的反对。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump is pushing a plan to explicitly use revenue from higher tariffs on imported goods to help pay for extending trillions of dollars in tax cuts, an unprecedented shift likely to face opposition from many of his fellow Republicans in Congress.】

item.title: 消息人士称，Permira、Blackstone 正在考虑数十亿欧元的 Mobile.de IPO
item.description: 三位知情人士称，收购集团 Permira 和 Blackstone 正在权衡对德国在线汽车市场 Mobile.de 进行数十亿欧元的首次公开募股。【原文：Buyout groups Permira and Blackstone are weighing a multi-billion-euro initial public offering of German online auto marketplace Mobile.de, three people with knowledge of the situation said.】

item.title: 汰渍洗涤剂制造商宝洁公司着眼于新一轮涨价以抵消即将到来的关税
item.description: 美国消费品制造商宝洁公司一位高管周三表示，如果唐纳德-特朗普总统征收新的关税，增加进口成本，该公司将再次寻求提高汰渍洗涤剂等家用基本产品的价格。【原文：U.S. consumer goods maker Procter & Gamble will again look to hike prices on its household basics such as Tide detergent if President Donald Trump imposes new tariffs that increase the cost of imports, an executive said Wednesday.】

item.title: 2024 年 SLB 在俄罗斯的资产价值为 6 亿美元，与 2023 年持平
item.description: 美国顶级油田服务公司 SLB 表示，截至 2024 年底，其在俄罗斯的净资产约为 6 亿美元，与 2023 年持平，但该地区的收入有所下滑。【原文：Top U.S. oilfield services company SLB said its net assets in Russia amounted to about $600 million at the end of 2024, unchanged from 2023, but revenue from the region had slipped.】

item.title: 纽约州获得针对被控掠夺性贷款人的 10.65 亿美元判决
item.description: 纽约州总检察长莱蒂西亚-詹姆斯（Letitia James）周三表示，她的办公室获得了对黄石资本公司（Yellowstone Capital）10.65 亿美元的判决，该公司是一家被控掠夺性贷款的现金垫款提供商，作为和解协议的一部分，该公司为小企业提供了超过 5 亿美元的债务减免。【原文：New York Attorney General Letitia James said on Wednesday her office obtained a $1.065 billion judgment against Yellowstone Capital, a cash advance provider accused of predatory lending, as part of a settlement that gives small businesses more than a half-billion dollars of debt relief.】

item.title: 消息称利安德将于本周末开始关闭休斯顿炼油厂
item.description: 利安德巴塞尔工业公司（LyondellBasell Industries）熟悉工厂运营的人士表示，该公司将于本周末开始永久性关闭其在休斯顿的日产量为 263,776 桶的炼油厂。【原文：LyondellBasell Industries will begin the permanent closure of its 263,776 barrel-per-day Houston refinery this coming weekend, said people familiar with plant operations.】

item.title: 美国上周原油库存可能下降，产品库存增加
item.description: 路透社周三进行的一项调查显示，上周美国原油库存预计将下降，而汽油和馏分油库存则可能上升。【原文：U.S. crude oil stockpiles were expected to have fallen last week while gasoline and distillate inventories likely rose, an extended Reuters poll showed on Wednesday.】

item.title: 特朗普退出气候法案与大石油公司产生罕见分歧
item.description: 美国石油和天然气生产商对唐纳德-特朗普总统希望鼓励国内能源发展感到兴奋，但他们表示，特朗普退出国际气候合作的决定无助于他们在全球向清洁能源转型过程中的投资计划。【原文：U.S. oil and gas producers are thrilled that President Donald Trump wants to encourage domestic energy development but say his decision to withdraw the United States from international climate cooperation will not help their investment plans in the global transition to cleaner energy.】

item.title: 2024 年净利润低于预期，彪马宣布削减成本
item.description: 体育用品品牌彪马周三宣布了一项成本削减计划，此前该公司公布的 2024 年净利润低于上年同期水平，未达预期。【原文：Sportswear brand Puma announced a cost-cutting programme on Wednesday after reporting 2024 net profit below the prior year's level, missing its expectations.】

item.title: 意大利11月份对美国的起泡葡萄酒出口量在可能的关税之前大幅增长
item.description: 行业组织意大利葡萄酒联盟（UIV）周三提供的最新数据显示，在美国可能对该行业征收关税之前，11月份意大利起泡葡萄酒（如普罗塞克）对美国的出口量创下了历史新高。【原文：Exports of Italian sparkling wine such as prosecco to the U.S. surged by a record amount in November before possible tariffs on the sector, the latest available data from industry group Unione Italiana Vini (UIV) showed on Wednesday.】

item.title: Verisk 预计伊顿和帕利塞兹大火将造成 280 亿至 350 亿美元的保险财产损失
item.description: 全球分析公司 Verisk 预计，帕利塞德和伊顿大火造成的投保财产损失在 280 亿美元至 350 亿美元之间，是业内对损失估计最高的公司之一。【原文：Global analytics firm Verisk expects insured property losses from the Palisades and Eaton fires in the range of $28 billion to $35 billion, one of the highest loss estimates from the industry.】

item.title: 独家报道OpenAI 告诉印度法院，删除 ChatGPT 数据将违反美国的法律义务
item.description: 路透社最近看到的一份文件显示，OpenAI 已向印度一家法院表示，任何移除为其 ChatGPT 服务提供支持的训练数据的命令都不符合其在美国的法律义务。【原文：OpenAI has told an Indian court that any order to remove training data powering its ChatGPT service would be inconsistent with its legal obligations in the United States, according to a recent filing seen by Reuters.】

item.title: Facebook 删除英国反种族主义组织的网页，然后又恢复了该网页
item.description: 英国最大的反种族主义组织之一 "站起来反对种族主义"（Stand Up to Racism）周三表示，其 Facebook 页面因涉嫌违反社交媒体平台关于冒名顶替的社区标准而被关闭，但随后又被恢复。【原文：One of Britain's biggest anti-racism organisations, Stand Up to Racism, said on Wednesday its Facebook page had been shut down for allegedly breaching the social media platform's community standards on impersonation, though it was later reinstated.】

item.title: 亚马逊退出魁北克业务，将裁员约 1700 人
item.description: 电子商务巨头亚马逊公司（Amazon.com）发言人周三表示，该公司将退出在魁北克省的业务，导致约 1700 个全职工作岗位流失。【原文：E-commerce giant Amazon.com is exiting its operations in Quebec, leading to the loss of about 1,700 full-time jobs, a company spokesperson said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 柏林敦促科技公司在投票前采取更多措施制止虚假信息
item.description: 德国内政部长周三要求社交媒体平台在下月大选前采取更多措施防止虚假信息，如明确识别政治广告和标注人工智能操纵的视频。【原文：Germany's interior minister told social media platforms on Wednesday to do more to prevent disinformation before next month's election, such as clearly identifying political advertising and labelling videos manipulated with AI.】

item.title: 达沃斯- 纽约证券交易所高层认为 2025 年美国 IPO 活动将十分活跃
item.description: 纽约证券交易所（New York Stock Exchange）的一位高管周三表示，强劲的美国经济和较低的利率可能会促进首次公开募股数量在近期势头的基础上于2025年激增。【原文：A strong U.S. economy and lower interest rates could foster a surge in the number of initial public offerings in 2025, building on the recent momentum, a top executive at the New York Stock Exchange said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 人工智能热潮吸引投资者，Meta 支持数据分析公司 Databricks
item.description: Databricks 周三表示，Meta Platforms 已作为投资者参与了一轮 100 亿美元的融资，旨在推动这家数据分析初创公司的扩张计划和新产品开发。【原文：Databricks said on Wednesday Meta Platforms had joined as an investor in a $10 billion funding round intended to fuel the data analytics startup's expansion plans and new product development.】

item.title: 微软 LinkedIn 因披露客户信息以训练人工智能模型而遭起诉
item.description: 微软的 LinkedIn 遭到了高级客户的起诉，他们称这个以商业为重点的社交媒体平台在未经许可的情况下向第三方披露了他们的私人信息，用于训练生成人工智能模型。【原文：Microsoft's LinkedIn has been sued by Premium customers who said the business-focused social media platform disclosed their private messages to third parties without permission to train generative artificial intelligence models.】

item.title: 谷歌赢得英国对俄罗斯广播公司封锁 YouTube 的禁令
item.description: 谷歌周三赢得了伦敦高等法院的一项禁令，该禁令旨在阻止俄罗斯执行针对美国科技巨头关闭谷歌和 YouTube 多个账户的判决。【原文：Google on Wednesday won an injunction from London's High Court to prevent the enforcement of Russian judgments against the U.S. tech giant over the closure of various Google and YouTube accounts.】

item.title: Stellantis 将推进在伊利诺伊州建造新型中型卡车的计划
item.description: 克莱斯勒母公司斯泰兰特周三表示，正在推进在伊利诺伊州贝尔维迪尔建造新型中型皮卡的计划。【原文：Chrysler parent Stellantis said Wednesday it is moving forward with plans to build a new mid-size pickup truck in Belvidere, Illinois.】

item.title: CNBC 报道：高盛首席执行官称中美改善关系很重要
item.description: 高盛集团（Goldman Sachs）首席执行官大卫-所罗门（David Solomon）周三表示，美国和中国这两个世界上最大的经济超级大国必须改善双边关系。【原文：Goldman Sachs CEO David Solomon said on Wednesday it was important for the U.S. and China, the world's two largest economic superpowers, to improve their bilateral ties.】

item.title: 先驱报》投资者投票反对 Boaz Weinstein 的改造计划
item.description: 赫尔德投资信托公司（Herald Investment Trust）的股东们周三否决了美国激进投资者萨巴资本（Saba Capital）要求对其董事会进行彻底改革的动议，这对创始人博阿斯-温斯坦（Boaz Weinstein）推动英国 2,690 亿英镑（合 3,330 亿美元）信托业改革的更广泛努力是一个打击。【原文：Shareholders in Herald Investment Trust on Wednesday rejected a campaign by U.S. activist investor Saba Capital to overhaul its board, in a blow to founder Boaz Weinstein's wider push to shake-up the UK's 269 billion pound ($333 billion) trust sector.】

item.title: 尽管特朗普进行了风能审查，葡萄牙 EDP 公司仍对其美国计划充满信心
item.description: EDP 首席执行官表示，EDP 确信其现有的美国陆上项目不会受到特朗普总统风电决策的影响，但这家葡萄牙最大的公用事业公司将在未来几个月内修改其未来业务计划和增长预期。【原文：EDP is confident its existing U.S. onshore projects will not be affected by President Trump's wind power decisions, its CEO said, but Portugal's largest utility company will revise its future business plan and growth expectations in coming months.】

item.title: 裕信银行首席执行官希望德国商业银行计划在 2025 年底前明朗化
item.description: 联合信贷银行首席执行官 Andrea Orcel 希望与德国新政府讨论收购德国商业银行的计划，他告诉德国《金融时报》（FAZ），希望最迟在今年年底能有明确的结果。【原文：UniCredit chief Andrea Orcel wants to discuss a planned takeover of Commerzbank with the new German government and hopes for some clarity at the latest by the end of the year, he told German paper FAZ.】

item.title: 阿迪恩公司高管表示，特朗普执政期间私募股权退出将有所恢复
item.description: 收购公司 Ardian 的执行总裁周三在达沃斯世界经济论坛的一个小组讨论会上说，在唐纳德-特朗普第二任总统任期内，私募股权投资的退出可能会恢复到几年来从未见过的水平。【原文：Private equity exits that had slowed dramatically may recover to levels not seen in several years under Donald Trump's second term as president, the executive president of buyout firm Ardian said on Wednesday on a panel at the World Economic Forum in Davos.】
